summary: Completed testing of RICE and MoSCoW scoring API endpoints and frontend components. Backend: 34/34 tests passed (100%). Frontend: ScoringComponents.jsx renders correctly, FeatureCard shows prioritize button (TrendingUp icon), FeatureScoringDialog opens and shows MoSCoW and RICE editors with proper functionality.

minor.issue: RICE scoring columns (rice_reach, rice_impact, rice_confidence, rice_effort, rice_total) were missing from database. Fixed by adding columns via ALTER TABLE.

passed_tests: GET /api/scoring/options - Returns MoSCoW and RICE options (200 OK)
GET /api/scoring/epic/{id}/moscow - Returns epic MoSCoW score (200 OK)
GET /api/scoring/story/{id} - Returns story RICE score (200 OK)
GET /api/scoring/bug/{id} - Returns bug RICE score (200 OK)
Frontend: Feature Planning Mode header renders
Frontend: FeatureCard shows prioritize button (TrendingUp icon)
Frontend: FeatureScoringDialog opens on prioritize click
Frontend: MoSCoW Priority section with dropdown
Frontend: RICE Score section with formula display
Frontend: Get AI Suggestions button present
Frontend: MoSCoW badge displays on FeatureCard
Frontend: RICE badge displays on FeatureCard
critical_code_review_comments: Backend scoring routes correctly implement all CRUD operations for MoSCoW and RICE
RICE calculation formula: (Reach * Impact * Confidence) / Effort is correctly implemented
MoSCoW validation enforces valid values: must_have, should_have, could_have, wont_have
RICE validation enforces: reach 1-10, impact [0.25,0.5,1,2,3], confidence [0.5,0.8,1.0], effort 0.5-10
Frontend ScoringComponents.jsx exports: MoSCoWBadge, RICEBadge, ScoringDisplay, MoSCoWEditor, RICEEditor, FeatureScoringDialog, RICEScoringDialog, EpicMoSCoWDialog
FeatureCard in Epic.jsx has prioritize button with data-testid='prioritize-feature-btn-{id}'
FeatureScoringDialog shows both MoSCoW and RICE editors with AI suggestion capability
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Error handling improved: 'not found' errors now return 404 instead of 400
test_credentials: Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev via 'Test Login' button on landing page. Session cookie: test_session_jarlpm_full_access_2025
seed_data_creation: Created test data: epic_test_scoring_001 (locked), feat_test_scoring_001, story_test_scoring_001, bug_test_scoring_001. Added RICE columns to bugs table.
context_for_next_testing_agent: RICE and MoSCoW scoring is fully implemented. Backend APIs all working (options, epic MoSCoW, feature MoSCoW+RICE, story RICE, bug RICE). Frontend has ScoringComponents.jsx with all editors and badges. FeatureCard in Epic.jsx has prioritize button that opens FeatureScoringDialog. AI suggestion endpoints exist but require active subscription and LLM provider. Test data IDs: epic_test_scoring_001, feat_test_scoring_001, story_test_scoring_001, bug_test_scoring_001. Test user: testuser@jarlpm.dev via Test Login.
